titleStmt.title: Light in the way to Paradise with other occasionals / by Dvdley the 2d late Ld. North.
titleStmt.author: North, Dudley North, Baron, 1602-1677.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 544:11 as Wing N1282 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1730:26 as Wing N1284B.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
With: Some notes concerning the life of Edward Lord North, Baron of Kirtling, 1658 / by Sir Dudley North... [London : Printed for William Rogers ..., 1682].
